startingPosition.instruction: Sit with the legs outstretched in front. Feet together. Hold the hands as though grasping the rower, palms facing down. Hands back towards to the shoulder. Spine Straight.

technique.instruction: Exhaling bend forward from the waist as far as possible, straightening the arms.
Inhaling lean back as far as possible, drawing the hands back towards the shoulders and return to step 1.

info: Repeat 5 times in the opposite direction.
Deep breathing should be done and movement should be in sync with the breathing.
